interface.name: weston_input_panel
interface.description: Only one client can bind this interface at a time.

request.name: set_toplevel

description.summary: set the surface type as a keyboard

request.description:
Set the input_panel_surface type to keyboard.
A keyboard surface is only shown when a text input is active.

request.name: set_overlay_panel

description.summary: set the surface type as an overlay panel

request.description:
Set the input_panel_surface to be an overlay panel.
This is shown near the input cursor above the application window when a text input is active.
